mapper.insert: insert into appointment_time (user_id, consultant_id, appointment_start_time, appointment_end_time) values (#{userId}, #{consultantId}, #{appointmentStartTime}, #{appointmentEndTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM appointment_time as a WHERE (a.appointment_end_time > #{appointmentStartTime} and a.appointment_end_time < #{appointmentEndTime} ) or (a.appointment_start_time > #{appointmentStartTime} and a.appointment_start_time < #{appointmentEndTime}) or (a.appointment_start_time < #{appointmentStartTime} and a.appointment_end_time > #{appointmentEndTime})
